statements: UPDATE FaceRecognitionData SET image_url='https://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE FaceRecognitionData SET recognition_result='{"success": true}' WHERE camera_id=2;
UPDATE FaceRecognitionData SET recognition_result = '{"person": "Alice"}', image_url = 'example.com/image', camera_id = 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE FaceRecognitionData SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00', image_url = 'example.com/image2', recognition_result = '{"person": "Bob"}', camera_id = 2 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE iot_cameras SET camera_name='Main Camera', location='Office' WHERE camera_id=1;
UPDATE facial_data SET face_encoding=E'\\xDEADBEEF',detection_timestamp='2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE data_id=5;
UPDATE iot_cameras SET location = 'Room A', camera_name = 'Camera 1' WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE facial_data SET face_encoding = E'\xDEADBEEF', detection_timestamp = '2021-09-20 15:30:00' WHERE data_id = 123;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE camera_details SET owner_name = 'John Doe', location = 'Main Entrance' WHERE camera_id = 2;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET timestamp = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE camera_details SET owner_name = 'New Owner' WHERE location = 'Entrance';
